resources.string: 1. What is the home for a Chinese tea ” Tieguanyin” ?
2. In which country does Crop Circle appear mostly?
3. Accroding to given pictures, you need to find the right shape for \"? \" block
4. Which of the following sentences are written by famous poet Rabindranath Tagore?
"Rest belongs to the work as the eyelids to the eyes."
"Man does not reveal himself in his history， he struggles up through it."
"The furthest distance in the world，Is not between life and death. But when I stand in front of you，Yet you don't know that I love you."
"There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so "

5. Eleven scientists are working on a secret project. They wish to lock up the documents in a cabinet so that the cabinet can be opened if and only if six or more of the scientists are present. What is the smallest number of locks needed?
